TopicTitle: I cannot see my unmanned space craft in the orbit view?!?!?

Articles.Content:
Has anyone else had this problem? I do not have any problems with seeing crafts that contain a kerbal, so I think I might just be missing something. Is there a component or something that I need to include on my craft to be able to see it in the orbit map?

Regards,

Ethan;.;

If your spacecraft has no probe core, it will be regarded as debris. You can access all craft types by going into the map view or tracking station and clicking on the correct icon in the craft type bar (top center).

Otherwise make sure all craft types are highlighted on.
